name: Laxmi Narasimha Reddy Gumreddy
title: Senior Systems Engineer | DevOps Sr. | Cloud Architect
description: Hi, I'm Laxmi Narasimha Reddy Gumreddy, a passionate and results-driven Senior Systems Engineer with over 8 years of experience designing, automating, and managing scalable infrastructure across AWS, GCP, and IBM Cloud. I specialize in DevOps practices, CI/CD automation, and cloud architecture, with a consistent track record of delivering high-performance solutions that align with business goals.

Over the years, I've led impactful infrastructure transformations at companies like Qualtrics and Clarabridgeâ€”building robust automation frameworks, optimizing cloud deployments, and ensuring operational reliability at scale. I thrive on solving complex engineering problems and continuously explore new technologies to architect resilient, secure, and future-ready systems.
